reg_info.act_under: Fairness is a Two-Way Street Act (Construction Labour Mobility), 1999

content.content: 1. (1) No provision of the Act applies with respect to construction work in Ontario under a construction contract that was in force before the date Ontario Regulation 49/02 comes into force. O. Reg. 50/02, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) does not apply with respect to a new contract with respect to a construction contract referred to in that subsection or work arranged with respect to a construction contract referred to in that subsection if the new contract is made or the work arranged on or after the date Ontario Regulation 49/02 comes into force. O. Reg. 50/02, s. 1 (2). Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) No provision of the Act applies with respect to construction work in Ontario under a construction contract that was in force before the date Ontario Regulation 49/02 comes into force. O. Reg. 50/02, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) does not apply with respect to a new contract with respect to a construction contract referred to in that subsection or work arranged with respect to a construction contract referred to in that subsection if the new contract is made or the work arranged on or after the date Ontario Regulation 49/02 comes into force. O. Reg. 50/02, s. 1 (2).

Français
